attributes.title: Donald trump had a threesome with his children’s
attributes.review: i got this app to support our beautiful president but immediately my phone kept on turning off and on and I got spammed with emails and viruses and unknown numbers calling me. i just wanna say as much as you love our 💞beautiful💞 president don’t download this app 👁👄👁

attributes.title: I have first degree burns
attributes.review: This app is awful. After downloading, my phone crashed and would not turn back on until I went to Apple to have it fixed, to which the employee told me “die stupid cishet Cracker” before punching me in the face, pouring boiling hot semen on me,  and stealing my phone

attributes.title: SO RUDE!!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with great intentions. It was great for the first 5 seconds when trump HIMSELF came out and started to beat me up and grabbed me by the 😾. He spit on me and called me all kinds of names and also robbed my house and stole my dog. I just cant believe I was treated this way. 0/10 do NOT download this disgraceful app 😡😡😡

attributes.title: absolutely terrible
attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible. there is no reason for anyone to have this app. upon opening it, i saw a cockroach fly into my room wearing a maga hat 😡. this INFURIATED me, considering the fact i took the time out of MY day to download YOUR presidents app. couldn’t be more disappointed.

attributes.title: Trash app 🤮
attributes.review: The second I downloaded the app my dog became a human told he came back from the future and trump gets elected again unless I write this review then the fbi secret service and mr Epstein himself came toke my dog to his island called trump and said he got who he asked for and also trump is a rapist and racist thank you 😊 rip my dog.

attributes.title: traumatizing 😰
attributes.review: after opening this app the first time my sister tripped over her fish tank and squished the cat living inside. It was a horrific event my dog will never be the same 😔 everyone in the family now is suffering from this experience and it’s all because of 🍊. Thank you 🍊.

attributes.title: Bad bad bad
attributes.review: This app is absolute garbage, it nearly killed my phone. I would not recommend to anyone whatsoever. It also took an eternity to download and it glitches so much. Now my phone has a green line on the screen. I hated this app more than words can explain.

attributes.title: This app is useless
attributes.review: This app is about as stupid as putting milk before your cereal. Whoever actually spends time on this app is mentally insane. It crashes my phone every time and made my battery drain extremely fast. 0/10 would not recommend!!!

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This app made me want to break everything inside my house. It’s just made me feel uncomfortable and uneasy. As I used it, everything in my phone just started to collapse, like bro please I just want to play iMessage games without glitching. Do not get this app, just horrible.

🌈🎈✨🎉👄👌🌸🥵🧚🏻‍♀️🎂I’ve never been so disappointed by an app before. It took forever to load, basically slowed down my whole phone, and once it finally loaded it froze out and closed immediately. Once it actually started to work some what right.... IT WAS JUST ABOUT SOME ORANGE MISOGYNISTIC PRESIDENT THAT ONLY VALUES HELPING THE RICH GET RICHER AT EVERYONE ELSES EXPENSES. that’s all:)✨🌈🔪🖕🌸🖕🌸🖕
